headline: Should UPS’s Shift Away From Amazon Toward Higher-Margin Logistics Require Action From United Parcel Service (UPS) Investors?
summary: In recent months, United Parcel Service has accelerated its overhaul by cutting lower-margin business, reshaping its delivery network, and expanding into higher-margin areas such as healthcare logistics, while analysts have updated their views to reflect the evolving outlook. A key insight is UPS’s deliberate move away from Amazon-related volume toward more profitable segments, aiming to improve revenue quality even if overall package counts grow more slowly. With UPS shares rising over the...
